com.labyrinthdash

Class GameMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.labyrinthdash.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and holds all the cells that make up the map
    Author:
    Isaac Doub

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameMap

        public GameMap()
        Creates the game map. Goes through the 2D array filling it with blank cells, then replaces certain blank cells with specified platforms.

    • Method Detail

      • getCellContaining

        public static GameCell getCellContaining(Vector2D position)
        Finds and returns a cell in which the provided point lies.
        Parameters:
        position - screen position a cell will cover
        Returns:
        GameCell in which the point provided lies

      • getCellsInProximity

        public static GameCell[] getCellsInProximity(Vector2D position)
        Finds and returns an array of cells containing and surrounding the position provided. This is used to limit the number of cells the player calls collision on.
        Parameters:
        position -
        Returns:
        Array of GameCell surrounding the position provided
